help.title: 帮助
instructions: 您可以用布尔逻辑运算符AND、OR和NOT组配检索词。应用AND可确保两个检索词都在结果中出现；应用OR可确保结果中至少包括两个检索词中的一个；应用NOT可确保结果中没有给定的检索词。
例如，您可以检索“癌症 OR 糖尿病 AND 团队 NOT 护士”。
这一方法可检索出关注为癌症或糖尿病患者提供护理的团队（但不包括护士）的文件。

signup.title: 注册
signup.confirmation_msg: 确认邮件已经发送至您的邮箱，请确认注册以激活您的账号！

date_range.title: 日期范围
date_range.instructions: （请填写两个四位数年份，如2008和2009，或不填，即不限制纳入研究的发表时间）

home_page.intro: CN_The world's most comprehensive, free access point for evidence to support policy makers, stakeholders and researches interested in how to strengthen or reform health systems or in how to get cost-effective programs, services and drugs to those who need them.

result_list.on_email: CN_An email was sent to %{email} with %{documents_count} documents
result_list.pending_search: CN_Perform a search by entering a keyword above or selecting the appropriate filters from the list on the right.

signup_prompt.instructions: 注册以查看20条以后的结果，保存文档和检索，发送电子邮件和导出文件，以及订阅邮件提醒

profile_page.title: 我的资料

forgot_password_page.title: 忘记密码
forgot_password_page.instructions: 请在下方输入您用于登陆的邮箱，我们将给您发送链接以重置密码
forgot_password_page.on_success: 密码重置提醒已经发送到您的邮箱

reset_password_page.title: 重置密码
reset_password_page.password_retained: CN_Thank you. Your original password has been retained.

unsubscribe_page.title: 取消订阅
unsubscribe_page.confirmation_msg: CN_Please click the button below to confirm that you would like to unsubscribe from the Evidence Service

saved_search_page.title: CN_Saved searches
saved_search_page.instructions: CN_You can subscribe up to one saved search and one curated search

dialog.message: CN_Creating a new subscribed search will unsubscribe you from your current one. Are you sure you want to do this?

saved_articles_page.title: CN_Saved documents
saved_articles_page.warning: CN_Documents you saved will be kept on this page for up to 6 hours.
saved_articles_page.instructions: CN_You can email or export those documents.

quota_exceeded_error_page.title: CN_Limit exceeded
body: CN_Limit exceeded. You have made too many requests in a short period of time than we allow.
CN_We limit the number of allowed requests to protect Health Systems Evidence from inappropriate use.
CN_If you feel this is an error on our part, please email [michael.yagudaev@func-i.com](michael.yagudaev@func-i.com)

errors.no_connection: 啊，无法加载数据，请检查您的网络链接。
errors.must_accept_terms: 你必须接受这些条款和条件！
errors.too_short: 太短了，必须至少8个字符
errors.signup_to_increase_limit: CN_You have exceeded our record limit. Please log in (or create an account for free) if you wish to access more documents.
